en.title: Achievers Recognition Dinner Jakarta, Indonesia, 13th June 2009 (1)
en.content:
REPORT BY FE INDONESIA COUNTRY LICENSEE MR. PATRICK WIDJAJA. 

FE's recent Achievers Recognition Dinner held at Millennium Hotel Jakarta on 13th June 2009 was a great success attended by many quality FE Leaders, Members and Invited Guests. Also attending was FE's Founder Director KS Lee together with Presidential Directors Sam Ho, Willy Toh, Stanley Liew and Kenny Wong. It was great to see new groups of Indonesian leaders and members attending the event.

Highlights Include:

- Entertainment by well known Indonesian TV Personality and Singer Sandro Tobing.

- Welcome Speech by FE's Indonesian Country Licensee Patrick Widjaja.

- Opening Speech by FE's Founder Director KS Lee.

- Testimonial by FE’s spokesperson, Former World Badminton Champion Foo Kok Keong.

- Product Demonstration by PD Willy Toh, who did a great job. All the first timers were very impressed by 
  the powerof FE's Quantum Pendant and Quantum Flask!

- Sharing and testimonial by Dr Fathema D Rachmat (Head, Unit Pelayanan Jantung Terpadu, Cipto
  Mangunkusumo Hospital) who performed a successful heart operation on the 5 months old baby girl. The
  operation was made possible with FE’s donation of RP 53 million via Rotary’s Gift of Life Program. Dr
  Fathema also reported that she and her team gave FE's Quantum Pendants to 25 heart patients and
  after a week, 70% shows good recovery. Our scalar energy pendants really work! 

- Sharing and Testimonials by FE Presidential Directors Sam Ho, Kenny Wong (who within first 30 days of
  joining FE, achieved Presidential Director) and Indonesian Director Chandra.

- Lucky Draws.

A BIG THANK YOU to FE's Indonesian Country Licensee Patrick Widjaja and his team, Irene Mongkar and J M Anowar for organizing the successful event. A BIG THANK YOU also to MC Sandro Tobing and to all FE Leaders for supporting the event.

AHOO! AHOO! AHOO!!! 
 
< Click Here For More Photos >
